alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:24PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Warrick, south central Gibson and northeastern Vanderburgh Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 824 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Branch, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Branch around 830 PM CDT. Haubstadt around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Darmstadt. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 17 and 23. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 19 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
